channel.title: Basic Example on standardese
channel.description: Recent content in Basic Example on standardese

item.title: Example 1
item.description: standardese looks for documentation comments as shown in the following example: /// A regular C++ style documentation comment. /// Multiple C++ style comments are merged automatically. /// This line has *two* leading whitespaces because one is always skipped. //! A C++ style comment using an exclamation mark. /// It will also merge with other C++ style comments. //! But don't worry, also with the exclamation mark styles. /** A C style documentation commment.
